title: May bundles, Mystery skins, and the Mystery Chest returns

What's with the binary thing-  "embrace your inner 0101001001"
Since one of the bundles only include "robots" they thought it would be funny. Though blade mistress morgana doesn't seem like a robot to me.

Even more strange about it, a single digit translated into binary always has a combination of only 8. that has 10, so, something they thought could go unnoticed? i had true sight for what they were trying there. {{item:2043}}
Don't get it. Explain?

I put that into a Binary Converter, and it was "R" (after I made it convertible)
"Embrace your inner ultimate"?
I believe Blade Mistress Morgana is intended to be a [street samurai](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/StreetSamurai).

{{champion:432}}
So only the bundles are on sale? for instance if I already have eternum Rek'Sai  I would still pay the full price for the other champs and skins?

If you have any champ or skin then there is a discount on the bundle. It depends bundle to bundle (and i think only the default bundles dont keep the discount if you own the champions) but there is a cut off of the bundle (e.g. the bundle costs 4000 rp but you have azir so the bundle might cost 3100)

So i had about 1000 RP lying around so i decided to buy a mystery chest. First one i opened was DJ Sona (Thank you based RNG gods). I quickly got more RP to afford two more chests. Ended up getting sabretusk Sejuani, and Frostfire Annie. So an Ultimate skin, and a legacy skin, + cool annie skin. I aint even mad.{{champion:1}}  {{champion:113}} {{champion:37}}
